definition: to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)

sentences.english: A membrane filtrating technology for coal- sluicing wastewater at coal-fired power plants is described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種處理燃煤電廠衝煤廢水的膜式過濾技術。

sentences.english: The results showed that there was not coal-pollution-burned endemic fluorosis in north of Huai River, Anhui.

sentences.english: The system structure of coke carried heat partial gasification combined cycle presented by the Department of Thermal Engineering of Tsinghua University is introduced.

sentences.english: The key is to ensure that future coal plants are using CCS.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵是確保今後的燃煤發電廠使用碳捕獲和封存技術。

sentences.english: First, reduce the coal consumption to carry out small target competition.

sentences.english: Coal quality testing is very important for the stable running of power plant.
sentences.chinese: 煤質檢測關係到電站燃煤鍋爐的穩定安全運行。

sentences.english: That is about the same as a large coal-fired power station.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的發電功率成本，和大型的燃煤發電廠差不多。

sentences.english: The technique of sulfur retention during coal combustion is a kind of sulfur capture technique conforming to the national conditions of China.
sentences.chinese: 燃燒中固硫是一種適合我國國情的燃煤脫硫技術。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-hepatic fibrosis effect of Ginkgo leaf in patients with coal-brunt arsenic.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究銀杏葉片抗燃煤型砷中毒肝纖維化作用。

sentences.english: Compared to coal, biomass pellet machine power generation.
sentences.chinese: 相比燃煤發電，生物質顆粒機發電優勢明顯。

sentences.english: Here in Israel, almost all the energy comes from coal-fired generators .
sentences.chinese: 在以色列，幾乎所有的能源都來自燃煤發電機。

sentences.english: The effective use of the CCPs technology has only just started in Asian countries.
sentences.chinese: 燃煤副產品的有效利用技術在亞洲國家纔剛剛起步。

sentences.english: It points out there are both advantageous and disadvantageous influence of UPC(unburnt pulverized coal)on the work of BF.
sentences.chinese: 指出，未燃煤粉的存在對爐況的影響有利有弊。

sentences.english: Both the combustion ash and the smokestack residue from coal-burning power plants are extremely toxic.
sentences.chinese: 燃煤發電所排放的灰燼和煙霧都是有毒物質。
